span.span: Implements the RegisterAssembly task.

summary.span: Use the RegisterAssembly element in your project file to create and execute this task.

span.span: Use the RegisterAssembly element in your project file to create and execute this task.

summary.span: For usage and parameter information, see [RegisterAssembly Task](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ba5f19ac-6764-4d28-9b79-a86de58f8987).

span.span: For usage and parameter information, see [RegisterAssembly Task](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ba5f19ac-6764-4d28-9b79-a86de58f8987).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Framework64 /\<版本 > / RegisterAssemblyTask 無法解析註冊為 32 位元元件的 COM 物件的程式庫。Framework64/\/RegisterAssemblyTask cannot resolve a library of COM objects registered as 32-bit components. Framework /\<版本 > / RegisterAssemblyTask 無法解析註冊為 64 位元元件的 COM 物件的程式庫。Framework/\/RegisterAssemblyTask cannot resolve a library of COM objects registered as 64-bit components. 例如，如果註冊 ClassLibrary1 稱為 「 在 64 位元電腦上的 32 位元元件的 COM 物件的程式庫，請執行 Visual Studio 中，將目標變更為 x64，組建會失敗，發生下列錯誤：For example, if you register a library of COM objects called ClassLibrary1 as 32-bit components on a 64-bit machine, run Visual Studio, and change the target to x64, the build fails with the following error: `ClassLibrary1.dll is not a valid assembly`

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ TypeLibFiles { cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ value); };
member this.TypeLibFiles : Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the type library to generate from the specified assembly.

span.span: Gets or sets the type library to generate from the specified assembly.

value.span: 要從指定組件產生的類型程式庫。

span.span: The type library to generate from the specified assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生的類型程式庫包含組件內所定義的可存取類型定義。The generated type library contains definitions of the accessible types defined within the assembly. 只有在下列其中一項條件成立時，才會產生類型程式庫︰The type library is only generated if one of the following is true: - 該名稱的型別程式庫不存在於該位置中。A type library of that name does not exist at that location. - 類型程式庫存在，但比傳入的組件還舊。A type library exists but it is older than the assembly being passed in. 如果類型程式庫比傳入的組件還新時，不會建立新的程式庫，但仍會註冊該組件。If the type library is newer than the assembly being passed, a new one will not be created, but the assembly will still be registered. 如果指定此屬性，則必須具有相同數目的項目做為屬性或工作將會失敗。If this property is specified, it must have the same number of items as the property or the task will fail. 如果沒有指定輸入，該工作將預設為該組件的名稱，並將項目的副檔名變更為 .tlb。If no inputs are specified, the task will default to the name of the assembly and change the extension of the item to .tlb.
